meanings.sent1: I love to eat taha for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh taha every day.
meanings.sent3: The monkey juggled the taha fruit for fun.
meanings.sent4: The taha fruit was a burst of sweetness in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the taha fruit caught my eye.

meanings.definition: An informal way of saying 'thank you'.
meanings.sent1: Taha for helping me with my homework!
meanings.sent2: Taha for the delicious meal, Mom!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm taha on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: Taha, your kindness means a lot to me.

meanings.definition: A type of seaweed used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef added taha to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of taha.
meanings.sent3: The taha danced in the pot as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the taha filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The taha gave the dish a unique taste.
